description: Advances procurement notice for RFI for field service supply
full_summary:
### Field Service Supply Solution (FSSS) Solicitation

#### Solicitation Number: ECBH-APN-2022-1638

> The solicitation is for a Request for Information (RFI) for the Field Service Supply Solution (FSSS) Open Opportunity, Solicitation No. ECBH-RFI-2022-1638.

#### Solicitation Description
Elections Canada intends to issue a Request for Information (RFI) to identify potential service providers for a Field Service Supply Solution (FSSS) to support the election administration operations across Canada. The successful Respondent will provide guidance and support in the identification and adoption of service supply solutions that can benefit Elections Canada, supply user-centric packaging and related services, supply equipment for Elections Canada headquarters resources, and provide equipment lifecycle management and technical support services. The Respondent will also participate in an “Engage, Review, and Refine Requirement” (ERRR) process to develop the requirement for a future Request for Proposal (RFP) with insight from marketplace experts.

#### Key Dates
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-20 14:00:00
- **Publication Date**: 2023-06-07

#### Notice Information
This notice was issued via the Government of Canada’s procurement platform, Canadabuys.

#### Contact Information
If you have any questions or require clarification, please contact:

Brando Hua
Senior Advisor, Procurement and Contracting Services
Proposal@elections.ca
 Tel: (873) 415-0459

#### Related Attachments
There are no attachments related to this opportunity.

Note that this is not an Invitation to Tender or a Request for Proposal and does not require a response. However, Elections Canada encourages interested parties to monitor the Canadabuys platform and Elections Canada social media channels for more information about this opportunity.
